title: What is the worst country for international students? - Quora

response.answer_text: On the top of my head, North Korea. Getting there would be a major hassle because only a few airlines fly to Pyongyang. Connecting via China or Russia is a must for most people.Potential of being arrested without due process. And it’s unlikely if you can get any help from your home country unless you are from China or Russia. Check out of the story of an American student who was arrested in North Korea: Who was Otto Warmbier?Disconnected from the rest of the world during the period of your study. (not necessarily a bad thing)Any diploma/certificate you received from there will probably have no value in your home country.The quality of education might not in par with other countries
Any countries that are worse than yours. The reason that you get out of your country to study because you don’t believe in your own colleges there.
